section.p: This class captures transfusion information associated with a specimen from the blood bank for a patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the transfusion event.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
Indicates the reverse chronological order of blood components transfused.

Contains zero or more [0..*] transfusionReaction, where its type is Transfusion Reaction
Indicates the transfusion reaction information associated with a transfusion.
Contains exactly one [1..1] bloodComponent, where its type is Blood Component
Contains exactly one [1..1] aboGroupCode with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] volumeTransfused with data type Physical Quantity
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasReaction with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] crossmatchComment with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] isRhPositive with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] transfusionDate with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] nbrOfUnitsPooled with data type Integer
